name: Hay Day Farm 2019
description: Build your dream Farm! Harvest crops, process them at your facilities, and sell goods to develop your town.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual Core or similar Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphique Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core i3 2.6GHz or similar Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 260 or better Storage: 2 GB available space
